channel.title: Problem connecting to any rsps i'm trying to put online localhost
channel.description: I've been stumped with a problem for a while I am not sure how to fix it. On matrix718 package I've got the server to where it connects but when I open the client it stays at 0% and doesn't load, I've already changed the server IP an port in loader.java to 127.0.0.1 and tried localhost as well and I have the port set to 43594. I've port forwarded 43594 and checked it and its good. The error that comes up in cmd while the client is stuck at 0% after 30seconds+ says error_game_js5connect. I've also tried on a few other client+source d/l's I have they usually have similar context saying cannot connect etc. Any help would be GREATLY appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: Problem connecting to any rsps i'm trying to put online localhost
item.dc:creator: @ascensi0n ascensi0n

I’ve been stumped with a problem for a while I am not sure how to fix it. I’ve port forwarded 43594 and checked it and its good. The error that comes up in cmd while the client is stuck at 0% after 30seconds+ says error_game_js5connect. I’ve also tried on a few other client+source d/l’s I have they usually have similar context saying cannot connect etc. Any help would be GREATLY appreciated. Thanks!
